mapper.sql: create_time, update_time, id, msg_id, msg_type, states,mem_id
mapper.select: SELECT mpr.id as id, mpr.title as title, mpr.content as content FROM msg_push_record mpr LEFT JOIN msg_status_record msr on msr.msg_id=mpr.id and msr.mem_id=#{memId} WHERE msr.id is null AND (mpr.device_type=0 OR mpr.device_type=#{deviceType})
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM msg_push_record mpr LEFT JOIN msg_status_record msr on msr.msg_id=mpr.id and msr.mem_id=#{memId} WHERE msr.id is null AND (mpr.device_type=0 OR mpr.device_type=#{deviceType})
